name: 💍👗Wedding Dress Maker 2
description:
Wedding is the most important day in everyone’s life. As a fantastic dress designer, you have a bridal boutique to customize the beautiful bride and handsome bridegroom. Let’s select the cloth, measure the size, cut and sew the dress. And you can offer the most beautiful outfits for your customers. Besides, you can also decorate your shop to make it more perfect.

Features:
👰 Tons of clothes to choose from
👰 Various accessories to make the dress look better
👰 Dress your customers up to be princesses and princes
👰 Enjoy the process of making dress
👰 Decorate the boutique

Are you ready to be an excellent dress maker and create fashionable clothes? Download and play it now!
